text: Instructions: If you have been assigned the researcher as your client, drag their information tile into your workspace.

INFORMATION TILE

Your client: The researcher

Your first task: Determine how much time students typically spend at school in your state.

Why the client wants to know this (the end goal): The researcher wants to compare the length of time that students spend at school in different countries around the world. For example, they learned that in South Korea, students spend about 12 hours each day in school, by attending both a day school and a night academy. They want to compare this to how much time students spend learning (being taught by a teacher or are otherwise supervised by a teacher) in your state.
